IInteractionBehaviour¶

class Leap::Unity::Interaction::IInteractionBehaviour

IInteractionBehaviour is the interface used by InteractionManager to drive interaction objects.

All interaction objects must extend from this base interface class. This class is an abstract extended MonoBehaviour instead of an interface.

Public Functions

abstract void GetInteractionShapeCreationInfo(out INTERACTION_CREATE_SHAPE_INFO createInfo, out INTERACTION_TRANSFORM createTransform)

Called by InteractionManager to get the creation info used to create the shape associated with this InteractionBehaviour.

Parameters
  • createInfo -
  • createTransform -

abstract void GetInteractionShapeUpdateInfo(out INTERACTION_UPDATE_SHAPE_INFO updateInfo, out INTERACTION_TRANSFORM interactionTransform)

Called by InteractionManager to get the update info needed to update the internal state of the object.

abstract bool IsAbleToBeDeactivated()

Returns whether or not this object can be deactivated.

abstract bool IsBeingGraspedByHand(int handId)

Returns whether or not a hand with the given ID is currently grasping this object.

abstract void NotifyBrushDislocated()

Called when a dislocated brush begins overlapping the InteractionBehaviour.

abstract void NotifyHandGrasped(Hand hand)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand begins grasping this object.

abstract void NotifyHandLostTracking(Hand oldHand, out float maxSuspensionTime)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand that was grasping becomes untracked.

The Hand is not yet considered ungrasped, and OnHandRegainedTracking might be called in the future if the Hand becomes tracked again.

abstract void NotifyHandRegainedTracking(Hand newHand, int oldId)

Called by InteractionManager when a grasping Hand that had previously been untracked has regained tracking.

The new hand is provided, as well as the id of the previously tracked hand.

abstract void NotifyHandReleased(Hand hand)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand stops grasping this object.

abstract void NotifyHandsHoldGraphics(ReadonlyList < Hand > hands)

Called by InteractionManager every frame that a Hand continues to grasp this object.

This callback is invoked both in LateUpdate.

abstract void NotifyHandsHoldPhysics(ReadonlyList < Hand > hands)

Called by InteractionManager every frame that a Hand continues to grasp this object.

This callback is invoked both in FixedUpdate.

abstract void NotifyHandTimeout(Hand oldHand)

Called by InteractionManager when an untracked grasping Hand has remained ungrasped for too long.

The hand is no longer considered to be grasping the object.

abstract void NotifyInteractionShapeCreated(INTERACTION_SHAPE_INSTANCE_HANDLE instanceHandle)

Called by InteractionManager when the interaction shape associated with this InteractionBehaviour is created and added to the interaction scene.

abstract void NotifyInteractionShapeDestroyed()

Called by InteractionManager when the interaction shape associated with this InteractionBehaviour is destroyed and removed from the interaction scene.

abstract void NotifyPostSolve()

Called by InteractionManager after all solving is performed.

abstract void NotifyPreSolve()

Called by InteractionManager before any solving is performed.

abstract void NotifyRecievedSimulationResults(INTERACTION_SHAPE_INSTANCE_RESULTS results)

Called by InteractionManager when simulation results are available for this object.

abstract void NotifyRegistered()

Called by InteractionManager when the behaviour is successfully registered with the manager.

abstract void NotifyUnregistered()

Called by InteractionManager when the behaviour is unregistered with the manager.

abstract void Validate()

Called to validate the state of the object.
